Header: Workshop on 'Beekeeping' Held in 574 Brigade Area
Content: Under the guidance of the General Officer Commanding, 57 Division, Brigadier A.S Hewawitharana, a workshop on 'Beekeeping' was held on Wednesday (5) at Pudiyakolanoi, Mankulam with the assistance of Officers and Other Ranks of the 3 Gajaba Regiment. The civilians who were interested in the project participated in the programme. The workshop was aimed at uplifting of the economic standards of people in 574 Brigade area of responsibility.
